Address.label: Address
Address.value: 120 PASSAIC AVENUE, FAIRFIELD, New Jersey, 07004, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kearny Financial Corp is a Maryland holding company for Kearny Bank, a federally-chartered stock savings bank. The bank is engaged in the business of attracting deposits from the general public in New Jersey and New York, and using these deposits, together with other funds, to originate or purchase loans for its portfolios and invest in securities. The bank's loan portfolio is chiefly comprised of loans collateralized by commercial and residential real estate. It is also heavily into secured and unsecured business and consumer loans. The bank's primary source of income is net interest income.

value.name: Keith Suchodolski
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Executive VP
